mapper.insert: insert into mbr_profile(user_serial_no, user_email, user_pwd, user_name, user_nick_name, user_birth_date, user_gender, user_phone_num, user_address, user_itrs, is_trainer) values( #{userSerialNo}, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userBirthDate}, #{userGender}, #{userPhoneNum}, #{userAddress}, #{userItrs}, #{isTrainer})
insert into mbr_user(user_serial_no, user_name, user_nick_name, user_login_type) values(#{userSerialNo}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userLoginType})
mapper.select: select user_email from mbr_profile where user_email = #{authEmail}
